ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Question for you druids out there ...
ygData.msgSnippet: I like to hear something like... My friend, I ve been hearing of evil brewing within borders of Norrath.  It seems as though the evil would leave an area
ygData.messageBody:
I like to hear something like...

My friend, I've been hearing of evil brewing within borders of Norrath. It
seems as though the evil would leave an area before I can arrive and show
them the beauty of Tunare. May I, a friend in good standing with the gods
of Light, be blessed with the spirit needed to speed my humble defense of
Norrath's Nature.

or the usual

/poke Sarakan
/dance Sarakan
/hug Sarakan
:gives Sarakan a lap dance.
/say gimme a SOW
/tell Sarakan hiya i need a sow now


Sarakan
19th level Druid
Lords of the Fallen
Bertoxx Server


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Nymue Ce'Nedra [SMTP:nymue_uberdruid@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 02, 2001 8:39 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Question for you druids out there ...
>
>
> Hi Mu :)
>
> < I don't see what is so rude about "Can I get a
> SoW?". Maybe its just me, don't know. >
>
> It's just that they don't say please, and this really
> irks me. My parents had this annoying thing they did
> to me growing up where if I said something like "Can I
> get some orange juice?" they'd say "I don't know, can
> you?" intending me to say "May I please have some
> juice." So I'm warped anyway ;-P
>
> Besides, saying "please" is only polite, I think.
>
> Cheers,
> Nymue
>
> =====
> Nymue Ce'Nedra
> Wood Elf Druid, Cazic-Thule Server
